description:
In the vibrant city of Turboville, Speedy, a young motorcycle with a passion for racing, enjoys competing alongside his friends in exciting local competitions. One day, after an impressive victory in one of these races, Speedy is discovered by a former world champion motorcycle, who invites him to participate in the Wheel City Grand Championship. Determined to succeed, Speedy undergoes rigorous training and travels to the big city. There, he faces even greater challenges and meets new friends, but he must also deal with unexpected problems in the urban hustle and bustle.

·More than 25 types of motorcycles
·More than 100 full color backgrounds
·More than 10,000 words that ensure a story of more than an hour
·Fun music that accompanies you throughout the story
·Image gallery to see all the motorcycles in detail


Can Speedy overcome all the obstacles and win the Grand Championship?
name: Motorcycles: World Championship
